column3: Hypertension  (age 18 years and above) (%) - Above Normal Range (Systolic >140 mm of Hg & Diastolic >90 mm of Hg )
column4: Hypertension  (age 18 years and above) (%) - Moderately High (Systolic >160 mm of Hg & Diastolic >100 mm of Hg )
column5: Hypertension  (age 18 years and above) (%) - Very High (Systolic >180 mm of Hg & Diastolic >110 mm of Hg )
